name: That Sinking Feeling (MorePixelStudios)
description:
A broken submarine is drifting deeper and deeper, and it's your job to keep it alive! A minigame extravaganza combined with a high-stakes scenario.

When the sub reaches the bottom the final button is in the top right next to the radar game. Sorry we didn't get an arrow created in time :(

Brock - Programmer and Game Design

Andrea - Art and Animation

Luke - Sound and Game Design

Max - Additional Colouring and Art
